activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9405
activity.text:
Can anyone please help me implement the closeNotification cypress command? following is what i have found so far:
  ðŸ“Œ sonner documentation:

[**[Dismissing toasts programmatically](https://sonner.emilkowal.ski/other#dismissing-toasts-programmatically)**](https://sonner.emilkowal.ski/other#dismissing-toasts-programmatically)

To remove a toast programmatically use `toast.dismiss(id)`. The `toast()` function return the id of the toast.

```
const toastId = toast('Event has been created'); toast.dismiss(toastId);
```

You can also dismiss all toasts at once by calling `toast.dismiss()` without an id.

```
toast.dismiss();
```

However, Iâ€™m unsure how to implement this in Cypress :(

**ðŸ“Œ Alternative method:** Dismiss by dragging

click â†’ hold â†’ drag upwards

i tried implementing this as follows

```tsx
Cypress.Commands.add("closeNotification", () => {
  cy.get("li[data-sonner-toast]")
    .should("exist")
    .trigger('mousedown', { which: 1, force: true })
    .trigger('mousemove', { clientY: 0, force: true })
    .trigger('mouseup', { force: true });
});
```

Unfortunately, it doesnâ€™t work as expected. Any suggestions?

i think using proper z-index should fix the issue!

> 
> Click on the test details and check the summary tab and scroll down, there should be screenshots you can refer to. At least some of the tests are related from what I can see, get those working, we can look at the rest after.
> 
> Get local [backend](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care) ([Docs](https://care-be-docs.ohc.network/local-setup/configuration.html)) working to run and test cypress locally.

I ran the tests that were failing due to `li[data-sonner-toast] div[data-title]` not being found, locally using `npm run cypress:open`. I have noted the details and would appreciate discussing them at your convenience.
